citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:08 AM on 20-
APR-22.
Inspectors knocked on door and rang the doorbell. Inspector called phone number listed for Licensee. Licensee was
away from the facility and could not return within 60 minutes.
Additional Inspectors:
KERI LUPO, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:08 AM on 20-
APR-22. 
 
Inspectors knocked on door and rang the doorbell.  Inspector called phone number listed for Licensee.  Licensee was 
away from the facility and could not return within 60 minutes. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KERI LUPO, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
